channel.title: For All New Beginers Who don't know how to do anything like me
channel.description:
[b]Hey, i'm making this because I have been stuck on this stuff for ONE WHOLE DAY! Since I'm new, I tried the tutorial Editing EasyRSC, So I did what he said, right up to when he said :Go into your server folder. Once in your server folder, go into:
Conf -- Server -- Defs
Once in the Defs folder, find and open your ItemsDef.xml file. :confused: :confused: :confused: When I opend the ItemsDef.xml, Safari opened and i couldn't edit a thing! (P.S I have tried EVERYTHING) So can anyone help me? Anyway this topic is for new people like me. Please help us [/b]i guess... [b][/b]

item.title: For All New Beginers Who don't know how to do anything like me
item.dc:creator: @Ryanbj Ryanbj
item.description:
@Ryanbj wrote:

Thanks guys! you really helped me![br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2009, 07:13:11 pm[/size][hr]Would I do the same with the NPC’S? Anyway, is this what you call codeing? ( I know, I’m a newbie so i don’t know)

Read full topic

Since I’m new, I tried the tutorial Editing EasyRSC, So I did what he said, right up to when he said :Go into your server folder. Once in your server folder, go into:

Once in the Defs folder, find and open your ItemsDef.xml file.
When I opend the ItemsDef.xml, Safari opened and i couldn’t edit a thing! (P.S I have tried EVERYTHING) So can anyone help me?
Anyway this topic is for new people like me. Please help us i guess…[/quote]
